QuestData.Title: WANTED: Gigantaur
QuestData.Description: By decree of Overlord Agmar:$B$BTarget: Gigantaur$B$BCrime: Attacks upon the Horde; "Bein' ugly"$B$BStatus: Alive$B$BThe magnataur lord, Gigantaur, is wanted in relation to a number of attacks against Horde soldiers and installations in the Dragonblight.$B$BGigantaur was last seen wandering the woods and roads south by southeast of Agmar's Hammer.$B$BGigantaur should be considered armed and extremely dangerous.$B$BAll bounties are paid out by Captain Gort at Agmar's Hammer.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Crime: Attacks upon the Horde; "Bein' ugly"
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Gigantaur and return to Captain Gort at Agmar's Hammer in the Dragonblight.
QuestData.CompletionText: Come to collect on a bounty?
QuestData.RewardText: You got that ugly son-of-a-horse, eh? Well that's one less nuisance our soldiers will have to deal with out in the frozen wastes.
